sys_element_mapping.value:
Dear Principal Sir,

Please find the details of the leave request.

 

Leave Number Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Leave Number
Student Name  Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Student Name
Leave Type  Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Leave Type
Leave Start Date  Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Leave Start Date
Leave End Date Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Leave End Date
Reason  Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Mention Leave Reason

 

 

 Note: This is the second reminder to approve / reject the leave request.  

Click here to approve / reject the request.
